ValidationRule.description: Cannot give a discount greater than 100 percent
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( (NOT(BEGINS($Profile.Name,"System Administrator"))), ISPICKVAL(WIN_Check__c,"PPS Discount") , OR( WIN__c<>1.0, ISBLANK(WIN__c) ))
ValidationRule.errorMessage: ***Payroll Processing Services package can only be discounted 100%***
